name: detailed_cake_recipe_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool the_birthday_cake_db.
Tool description: Birthday cake recipes with high-quality images stored on AWS S3 for fast accessibility. Easy to use!
Category: Food, Cakes
API description: This function retrieves a detailed cake recipe based on a given recipe ID from the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The ID of the cake recipe to retrieve.
